title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2762/1999 of 22 December 1999 adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2762/1999
of 22 December 1999
adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The maximum annual fishing effort for the Kingdom of Spain in respect of demersal species using towed and passive gear respectively, as referred to in the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2027/95, is amended, as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
